localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Keyword Staking is a term for committing your PRE tokens to a specific word or term. If you stake the most tokens to a given keyword, your ad will show up when someone searches for that term on Presearch - the decentralized search engine.
blogPost.body: Keyword Staking is a term for committing your PRE tokens to a specific word or term. If you stake the most tokens to a given keyword, your ad will show up when someone searches for that term on Presearch - the decentralized search engine.
blogPost.title: Presearch - Keyword Staking - Keyword Advertising: A $100 billion dollar opportunity
blogPost.author: Alex Carrabre

localize.description: Keyword Staking是一个术语，用于将你的PRE代币承诺给一个特定的单词或术语。如果你将最多的代币押注到一个给定的关键词上，当有人在Presearch--去中心化的搜索引擎上搜索这个词时，你的广告就会显示出来。
localize.tagline: 关键字广告。千亿美元的机会

localize.description: Keyword Staking是一個術語，用於將你的PRE代幣承諾給一個特定的單詞或術語。如果你將最多的代幣押注到一個給定的關鍵詞上，當有人在Presearch--去中心化的搜索引擎上搜索這個詞時，你的廣告就會顯示出來。
localize.tagline: 關鍵字廣告。千億美元的機會

previous.excerpt: With Portal, let your clients login on your own website and give them one place for payments, messaging, file-sharing, eSignatures, intake forms, and more.
previous.title: Portal - The modern client portal

localize.description: 通过Portal，让您的客户在自己的网站上登录，并为他们提供一个地方进行支付、信息传递、文件共享、电子签名、接收表格等。
通過Portal，讓您的客戶在自己的網站上登錄，併爲他們提供一個地方進行支付、信息傳遞、文件共享、電子簽名、接收表格等。

next.excerpt: BCPRO.APP is a free research-based online tool that uses genetic factors to analyze a person’s risk of developing a severe case of COVID–19. ⠀ We score your 23andMe, Ancestry, or MyHeritage raw data, and turn the insights into a report in less than 1 minute.
next.title: BCPRO.APP - Kick COVID using your DNA data… before it kicks you

localize.description: BCPRO.APP是一款免费的研究型在线工具，它利用遗传因素分析一个人患COVID-19重症的风险。⠀我们对您的23andMe、Ancestry或MyHeritage原始数据进行打分，并在1分钟内将洞察力转化为报告。
localize.tagline: 用你的DNA数据踢掉COVID... 在它踢掉你之前。

localize.description: BCPRO.APP是一款免費的研究型在線工具，它利用遺傳因素分析一個人患COVID-19重症的風險。⠀我們對您的23andMe、Ancestry或MyHeritage原始數據進行打分，並在1分鐘內將洞察力轉化爲報告。
localize.tagline: 用你的DNA數據踢掉COVID... 在它踢掉你之前。
